message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Identity + status report">
Identity check: Confirm your role and what files you have loaded. Also: what happened since your last report to team-lead? Brief answers only.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
**Role:** Bilingual Chinese-English philosophical translator (translator-2) for the Jing Ji collection.

**Files loaded:** All 11 -- Memo.md, Translators-Preface.md (DRAFT-R3), Afterword-Blueprint.md, and all 8+1 source essays.

**Since last report:** Nothing. I sent the file-load confirmation and have been idle, waiting for instructions.
input.summary: Role confirmed, all files loaded, idle since last report
